title: RIOT , ACCOUNT STOLEN BEEP BOOP BOP
body: So my cousin got his account stolen and put in a ticket to riot support, he would make this himself however he doesn't have his account. Is there any other way to help him other than waiting for a response.

replies.body: We'll only be able to help if it's the owner reaching out to us.  I appreciate your wanting to help your cousin out but he'll have to contact us directly.  He can use our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) to do this, which will allow him to use an email address he does have access to.  We'll get back to him and help get the account back to his hands!
